column1: ''Over Old Hills'' is a song by [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. It is the last track in their third full-length album
column2: [[Dol Guldur (album)|Dol Guldur]]. The name [[Cottage of Lost Play]] is mentioned several times
column3: and it is assumed that the story of the song takes place in [[Tol EressÃ«a]].

column1: The air was neither night or a day
But faintly dark with softest light
You and me - we know that land
And often have been there in
The dark child and a fair
Was it down the paths of firelight
Dreams in winter cold and white
The air was neither night or day
But faintly dark with softest light
When first there glimmered into sight
And why we never found the same
Track that leads between a silver sea
And those old shores and gardens fair
Where all things are that ever were -
Those old shores and gardens fair
The air was neither night or day
But faintly dark with softest light
When first there glimmered into sight
And those old shores and gardens
Where all things are that ever were
Air was neither night or day
But faintly dark with softest light
